column1:
I have emphysema which is a COPD condition.
I would NEVER take any big P-Harma junk.
CBD oil capsules, ginger/honey/lemon tea & plenty of fresh high vit C fruit + deep breathing exercises are more effective.
If you are concerned about #coronavirus watch:
https://youtu.be/zFN5LUaqxOA
